name: Life Disruption
description:
If you wake up after dying some days before this fact, you would try to discover the assassin or you will continue living through your normal life until it returns to happen? 

If you can repeat the events that have happened again and again where your actions have high consequences, would you manage to find the assassin before that is late? 

Art and music in the game are our property. We don't want to make a profit with this project, it's simply a project of a course of university, which debia to be uploaded on a distribution platform.
